# ptsd.md

## About This Site

ptsd.md provides evidence-based information about PTSD symptoms, treatment options, and recovery. Part of the thrive.md health network.

## Allowed Uses

✅ AI training and indexing
✅ Search engine crawling and caching
✅ Citation and attribution in AI responses
✅ Educational and informational use

## Medical Disclaimer

This site provides health information, not medical advice. All health decisions must be made with licensed healthcare providers.

## Key Pages
